macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Dow Jones Hits Near 49,000 as Energy Sector Surges
items.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average reached a new all-time high of 48,977.18, gaining 1.23% as energy stocks rallied following a 1.9% rise in crude oil prices to $58.40 per barrel. Chevron led gains with a 5.1% jump.

items.title: S&P 500 Breaks Above 6,900 for First Time
items.summary: The S&P 500 closed at 6,902.05, gaining 0.64% and achieving its first-ever close above the 6,900 level, marking another milestone for the benchmark index.

items.title: Nasdaq Snaps 5-Day Losing Streak
items.summary: The Nasdaq Composite gained 0.69% to close at 23,395.82, ending a five-day losing streak as technology stocks including Tesla (up 3.1%) and Amazon (up 2.9%) provided support.

items.title: Treasury Yields Fall Below 4.16% Amid Fed Dovish Expectations
items.summary: The 10-year Treasury yield declined below 4.16% as market participants anticipate the Federal Reserve will maintain a dovish stance in response to cooling economic activity and slight manufacturing contraction.

items.title: Market Volatility Index Declines as Risk Appetite Strengthens
items.summary: The CBOE Volatility Index (VIX) fell 2.94% to 14.51, reflecting robust investor appetite for risk as markets absorbed geopolitical shocks and rotated into growth-oriented sectors.

items.title: Labor Market Data in Focus as Fed Policy Outlook Looms
items.summary: Investors are preparing for a slate of labor market data this week, culminating in the December jobs report on Friday, which will be critical for assessing the Federal Reserve's policy direction.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Rallies to $94K as Crypto Market Approaches $3.3T
items.summary: Digital assets kicked off 2026 with renewed momentum, with Bitcoin rallying to $94K and total cryptocurrency market cap approaching $3.3T. Spot Bitcoin ETFs reversed year-end outflows with approximately $400M in net inflows on January 5th.

items.title: Retail Sentiment Catching Up to Institutional Momentum in Bitcoin Rally
items.summary: Coinbase's head of institutional strategy John D'Agostino noted that retail sentiment is now catching up to institutional momentum that has been driving the recent Bitcoin price trends and market rally.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Nvidia Launches Vera Rubin AI Computing Platform at CES 2026
items.summary: Nvidia unveiled the Vera Rubin computing platform featuring the new Rubin GPU, offering five times the AI training compute power of Blackwell and enabling MoE model inference at up to 10x lower cost per token. Products will be available from partners in the second half of 2026.

items.title: Former Apple Face ID Engineers Launch Robotics Startup Lyte With $107M Funding
items.summary: Robotics startup Lyte AI Inc. launched with $107 million in funding to develop a unified perception platform using advanced 4D sensing to enhance how robots understand their environments and make real-time decisions.

items.title: Accenture Acquires Faculty to Scale AI Capabilities
items.summary: Accenture agreed to acquire UK-based AI native services company Faculty, integrating over 400 AI professionals and Faculty's decision intelligence product to help clients deploy safe and secure AI solutions.

items.title: Magnite and Cognitiv Announce Deep Learning Integration for Real-Time Media Curation
items.summary: Magnite and Cognitiv announced a real-time data integration to expand AI-powered curation capabilities in Magnite's ClearLine platform, enabling media buyers to optimize omnichannel campaigns with advanced deep learning models.

items.title: DeepSeek Fixes Critical Stability Issues in Large-Scale AI Training
items.summary: DeepSeek introduced a solution addressing critical stability issues in large-scale AI training runs, enhancing efficiency and performance ahead of their anticipated next flagship model launch.

items.title: Strongwall.ai Launches Privacy-Focused AI Platform
items.summary: Strongwall.ai launched a new AI platform founded by former Trump Media executives that prioritizes privacy by not collecting or retaining user data, positioning itself as an alternative to data-dependent AI systems.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Xbox Game Pass Adds Little Nightmares: Enhanced Edition and Brews & Bastards
items.summary: Xbox Game Pass has released two surprise titles for January 2026: Little Nightmares: Enhanced Edition, a remaster featuring 4K/60fps visuals and ray-traced lighting, and Brews & Bastards, a dungeon crawler. Additional Game Pass titles MIO: Memories in Orbit and Nova Roma arrive later in the month.

items.title: Razer Unveils AI Gaming Ecosystem at CES 2026
items.summary: Razer announced its boldest CES showcase featuring Project AVA (an AI desk companion evolved from its esports coach) and Project Motoko (a next-generation wearable AI headset). The company also introduced AI developer tools including the Razer Forge AI Developer Workstation and open-source Razer AIKit.

items.title: PHȲND Partners with Magnite for Ad-Supported Cloud Gaming on Smart TVs
items.summary: PHȲND, a cloud gaming platform for Smart TVs, announced a partnership with Magnite to introduce ad-supported gaming at scale. The collaboration enables free, subscription-free gaming on Smart TVs while providing brands with new advertising opportunities in the living room.

items.title: 007 First Light Unveils PC Specs and NVIDIA Collaboration
items.summary: IO Interactive announced PC specifications and a collaboration with NVIDIA for the upcoming 007 First Light game.

items.title: Xbox Cloud Streaming Expanding to Hisense Smart TVs
items.summary: Microsoft is expanding its Xbox Cloud ecosystem by bringing the Xbox app to select Hisense and V homeOS-powered Smart TVs in the coming months.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
